result.execSummary:
The defendant Marcos L Contreras was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Partial payment plan:  $25.00 per month.  2 day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marcos L Contreras

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RCSO, DNA collected - 12-08-2015 at 09:40 am

Defendant Marcos L Contreras in court.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Still testing positive.  State rec:  fine+cc.  
Court conducts colloquy w def re rights.  Def waives rights.
P - G
BTC:  Guilty
25+cc
PPP $25/mo begin 2-1-16
FTP:  2 days
DNA
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in violation of agency requirements.

Pre-trial conference at 11-05-2015 03:15 pm.
Status conference at 12-08-2015 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 4:00 p.m.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Marcos L Contreras in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.
